benefits.heading: Saubio
benefits.title: Your benefits
benefits.description: Compare, insure and manage your cleaning projects effortlessly.

match.title: Ideal provider
match.body: Browse profiles, ratings and prices to select the perfect fit.

insured.title: Insured service
insured.body: Every mission is backed by Saubio’s liability coverage up to €5 million.

quality.title: Trusted quality
quality.body: Ops dashboards, audits and satisfaction metrics keep the bar high.

support.title: Responsive support
support.body: Customer care available 6 days a week via e-mail, phone or WhatsApp.

hero.description: Saubio connects households, companies and certified partners to deliver reliable, transparent cleaning tailored to your needs.

providerRegister.compliance: By submitting you authorise Saubio to review your documents and contact you by email or phone.

requirements.title: What we verify
items: Eco cleaning certification or equivalent training

bookingForm.title: Book a mission
bookingForm.subtitle: Fill in the details below; you can adjust everything later from your dashboard.

validation.surface: Surface must be greater than zero.
validation.startBeforeEnd: Start time must be before end time.
validation.startInPast: The slot must be in the future.
validation.conflict: This slot is already booked. Pick another time.

availability.title: Availability
availability.conflictDetail: Another booking already exists in {{city}} on {{start}}.
availability.pastDetail: Choose a future schedule to request the mission.
availability.invalidDetail: Complete the dates to check availability.

residential.label: Residential cleaning
residential.description: Recurring or one-off cleaning for flats and houses.

office.label: Office cleaning
office.description: Cleaning offices, practices or co-working areas outside opening hours.

industrial.label: Industrial deep cleaning
industrial.description: Intensive servicing of production or storage areas with demanding floors.

windows.label: Window & glass cleaning
windows.description: Professional cleaning of window panes, frames and reachable glass surfaces.

disinfection.label: Disinfection & hygiene
disinfection.description: Targeted cleaning with certified agents for high-traffic areas.

eco_plus.label: Eco Plus
eco_plus.description: Cleanings exclusively with certified sustainable products.

carpet.label: Carpet cleaning
carpet.description: Care and deep cleaning of carpets and runners.

upholstery.label: Upholstery cleaning
upholstery.description: Cleaning sofas, armchairs and chairs with stain treatment.

spring.label: Spring / deep cleaning
spring.description: Comprehensive full cleaning including hard-to-reach areas.

final.label: Final / handover cleaning
final.description: Cleaning after move, renovation or construction including handover check.

cluttered.label: High-effort household
cluttered.description: Support for heavily soiled or unorganised homes.

included.2: Clean windows and frames post works

move_out.label: Move-out cleaning
move_out.description: Special cleaning as part of a move.

restaurant.label: Hospitality cleaning
restaurant.description: For restaurants, cafés and hospitality venues.

heavy_dirty.label: Heavily soiled home
heavy_dirty.description: For homes with heavy grime beyond standard scope.

clearout.label: Clear-out service
clearout.description: Removing and disposing of household goods.

wood_terrace.label: Wooden deck cleaning
wood_terrace.description: Cleaning wooden terraces and similar outdoor areas.

hoarder.label: Hoarder apartment
hoarder.description: Service for extremely cluttered or neglected homes.

deep_disinfection.label: Disinfecting cleaning
deep_disinfection.description: Focus on intensive disinfection beyond standard hygiene.

included.1: Complete disinfection of bathroom and kitchen

profile.signInPrompt: Sign in to edit your profile and manage notification preferences.

configurator.heading: 3-step booking
configurator.title: Configure your mission with live pricing
configurator.description: Select service, frequency and preferences (eco products, checklists, access) and check availability of certified partners in your area.
steps: Choose preferences: favourites, eco mode, one-off or recurring.
Validate, pay securely and track the mission in real time.

about.heading: Our commitment
about.title: Certified cleanliness that respects your spaces and the planet
about.description: Every Saubio provider is verified (ID, insurance, certificates) and trained on German hygiene standards. We cover residential, offices, retail, hospitality and industrial sites.

highlights.title: Providers onboarded in 48h
highlights.description: Document checks, liability insurance, VAT compliance and digital signatures.

highlights.title: Real-time tracking
highlights.description: Checklists, secure chat, photos and client approval before billing.

cards.title: Verified partners
cards.description: Tax documents, insurance and EcoClean badge validated.

cards.title: Secure payments
cards.description: Mollie & PayPal for freelancers and teams.

cards.title: GDPR compliant
cards.description: Hosted in AWS Frankfurt with consent management.

services.heading: Saubio service catalogue
services.title: Solutions for households, freelancers and enterprises
services.description: Each service can be booked manually or via SmartMatch – with eco option, multi-site management and full tracking.

items.title: Offices & coworking
items.description: Flexible workspaces, meeting rooms, open space.

matching.heading: Provider selection
matching.title: Control preferences or let Saubio choose
matching.description: Pick the right mode for every mission. Combine company teams and freelancers, validate documents and follow allocation from the dashboard.

modes.title: Manual selection
modes.description: Compare profiles, check rates, add favourites and manage recurrence.
points: Filters by rating, price, distance and speciality

modes.title: SmartMatch automation
modes.description: Algorithm selects the ideal provider based on criteria and live availability.
points: Score by rating, reliability and proximity

eco.heading: Eco option
eco.title: Eco-friendly cleaning with full traceability
eco.description: Supplier info, EU Ecolabel, stock tracking and invoice mention documented. Business clients can audit missions directly from the dashboard.
points: Checklist: products used, quantities, photo proof
CO₂ stats, eco adoption rate, quality score per site

reasons.title: Verified providers
reasons.description: KYC, insurance, hygiene training and EcoClean badge.

reasons.title: Secure payments
reasons.description: Mollie, PayPal Business and SEPA ready.

reasons.title: Live tracking
reasons.description: Chat, photos, optional geolocation and approval before invoicing.

reasons.title: Support 7/7
reasons.description: DE/EN/FR assistance for clients, providers and admins.

reasons.title: German compliance
reasons.description: AWS Frankfurt, legal imprint, VAT & GDPR compliant.

reasons.title: Analytics
reasons.description: Dashboard with eco vs. standard, satisfaction and revenue per city.

mobile.heading: Mobile apps
mobile.title: Follow every mission with the Saubio app
mobile.description: Clients, providers, managers and admins access schedules, chat, payments and documents in real time (React Native & Expo).

flows.title: Clients
flows.summary: Clients: guided booking, live pricing, secure chat, invoices, loyalty program.

flows.title: Providers
flows.summary: Providers: availability, team missions, checklists, photo proof, instant payouts.

flows.title: Business & admin
flows.summary: Business/Admin: multi-site control, eco audits, quality dashboards, dispute tools.

pricing.heading: Plans
pricing.title: Transparent pricing for every need
pricing.description: Pricing adapts to surface, frequency, number of providers and eco option. Businesses can negotiate framework contracts with central billing.

testimonials.heading: Trusted by
testimonials.title: Voices from clients, companies and providers

items.name: Lukas Meyer
items.quote: SmartMatch saves us time. Eco reports feed directly into our ESG audits.

items.name: Anaïs Dupont
items.quote: Live tracking and multi-site invoicing simplify our daily operations. Support is very responsive.

items.name: Jonas Richter
items.quote: Clear calendar, fast payouts and eco missions boost my business.

cta.heading: Ready to get started?
cta.title: Book online now and receive a free site audit
cta.description: We support you with migration, onboarding your providers and ongoing quality monitoring.
points: Launch within 48h in Berlin, Hamburg, Munich, Cologne
Import existing providers and verify documents
Training for client, provider and admin teams

footer.description: Modern, sustainable cleaning platform for major German cities. Verified providers, eco products and 7-day support.

cookie.title: This website uses cookies.
cookie.body: We use cookies that are strictly necessary for the technical operation of our platform. With your consent we also use cookies to store your preferences, analyse performance, embed third-party content and display personalised ads.
cookie.consent: By clicking “OK” you agree to the use of cookies for preferences, statistics and marketing and allow us to share certain data with external providers, including partners outside the EU.
cookie.decline: If you do not consent, we will restrict ourselves to the technically necessary cookies only.
cookie.more: More details and all options can be found under “Settings” and in our privacy policy.

section.placeholderDescription: This section will be available shortly in the admin console.

timeline.invoiceReadyDescription: Your invoice can now be downloaded from your dashboard.
timeline.paymentCapturedDescription: We secured the payment for this mission. Ops will keep you updated.

checkoutAccount.title: Create your Saubio account
checkoutAccount.subtitle: Save your booking and continue to payment. You can manage everything from your dashboard afterwards.

errors.missingBooking: We could not find the booking reference.
errors.restart: Please restart your booking from the beginning.

summary.title: Booking summary
summary.deposit: Short notice deposit: {{amount}} (captured instantly, released once the mission is confirmed).

checkoutPayment.title: Confirm your payment
checkoutPayment.subtitle: Validate the short-notice deposit or review the last details before your mission.

errors.authRequired: Please sign in to continue the payment.

actions.shortNoticeDescription: Confirm the temporary hold of {{amount}}. It will be released automatically if the mission cannot be matched.
actions.shortNoticeNoDeposit: A deposit will be confirmed automatically as soon as a provider accepts.
actions.standardDescription: Your booking is recorded. No action is required for this schedule.
actions.supportHint: Ops will contact you once a provider accepts.

help.title: Need help?
help.description: You can review your booking or contact support at any time.

success.title: All set!
success.description: Your payment is confirmed. Ops is preparing the mission.

paymentConfirmed.subject: Your payment is confirmed
paymentConfirmed.bodyShortNotice: We’ve confirmed the temporary hold of {{amount}} for booking {{bookingId}}. Ops will contact you once a provider accepts.
paymentConfirmed.bodyStandard: We’ve received your payment of {{amount}} for booking {{bookingId}}. Your mission is now fully confirmed.

providerProfilePage.title: Provider profile
providerProfilePage.subtitle: Keep your public profile up to date for clients.

sections.profileDescription: Keep a clear description and highlight what makes you different.
sections.addressDescription: Your legal German address ensures you can accept Saubio missions.
sections.addressEmpty: No address on file. Add one to unlock requests near you.
sections.identityDescription: Upload your ID so our team can validate your account.
sections.zonesDescription: Mark the neighbourhoods or cities where you can operate.
sections.zonesEmpty: No service area yet. Start adding cities or districts you cover.
sections.zonesHelp: Type a city, district or postal code, then select it.

payout.requiredDescription: Add your bank details to receive missions. The secure flow is managed by Mollie.
payout.reviewDescription: Mollie is reviewing your payout details. Reopen the portal if adjustments are needed.
payout.rejectedDescription: Some information has to be corrected. Reopen the Mollie portal to finish the activation.
payout.readyDescription: Your payout data is verified. Transfers are triggered automatically after each mission.

statusHint.pending: Add your bank details to start the verification.
statusHint.in_review: Mollie is checking your information. This may take a few minutes.
statusHint.rejected: Details were rejected. Reopen the portal to provide the requested updates.

payout.error: Unable to create an onboarding link right now.

providerServicesPage.title: Services you offer
providerServicesPage.subtitle: Select the service types you currently provide so we can match you with relevant missions.
providerServicesPage.success: Your service selection has been saved.
providerServicesPage.additionalInfo: Customers can add additional wishes via the free-text field. If you can cover those extra tasks, feel free to accept the request.
providerServicesPage.selectionHint: Keep at least one service type selected to receive matching requests.

hero.title: Join our vetted provider network
hero.description: Saubio connects experienced cleaning professionals with reliable clients. We handle marketing, billing and support so you can focus on your missions.
hero.caption: Working with trusted pros across Germany

planning.title: Predictable missions
planning.description: Pick the districts and hours that suit you – we show matching requests in real time.

payments.title: Fair payouts
payments.description: Transparent hourly net rates, on-time payouts and loyalty bonuses for recurring clients.

insurance.title: Insured & supported
insurance.description: Professional liability coverage, responsive support and digital tools for invoices and planning.

sustainability.title: Sustainable jobs
sustainability.description: Saubio works with clients who value long-term collaborations and certified eco products.

benefits.heading: Benefits for partners
benefits.title: Why Saubio?
benefits.description: We combine personal support with smart tools so you can organise missions, collect reviews and secure fair earnings.

profile.label: 1. Short profile
profile.body: Tell us if you start as an individual or small team. We review your basics within 24h.

onboarding.label: 2. Onboarding call
onboarding.body: We discuss availability, preferred areas and show you the app. You get access to the partner portal.

firstMission.label: 3. First mission
firstMission.body: Pick matching jobs or let smart matching work for you. Confirm missions with one click.

final.heading: Ready for new missions?
final.title: Start as a Saubio provider now
final.description: Register for free, set up your profile and receive verified requests. Our team supports you from the first call to recurring clients.

providerAvailabilityPage.title: Availability & calendar
providerAvailabilityPage.subtitle: Plan your free slots and upcoming breaks.
providerAvailabilityPage.comingSoon: We’re building an interactive calendar to manage your availabilities and breaks.
providerAvailabilityPage.betaNotice: Meanwhile you can reach our team to update your planning or use the help center.
providerAvailabilityPage.timeOffDescription: Let us know about vacations or breaks so we avoid sending requests during that period.

providerStatsPage.title: Statistics & reviews
providerStatsPage.subtitle: Track your reliability, response time and client reviews.
providerStatsPage.comingSoon: Soon you will see detailed stats, KPIs and revenue trends here.
providerStatsPage.betaNotice: You can already review your revenue in the “Revenue” section. Reviews will appear here shortly.
providerStatsPage.reviewsDescription: Quickly access future feedback and respond directly from this page.
providerStatsPage.reviewsHint: Detailed review management is arriving soon.

adminUsers.title: Users
adminUsers.subtitle: Manage Saubio roles, status and access.

adminProviderRequestsPage.title: Provider onboarding
adminProviderRequestsPage.subtitle: Review freelance cleaners and companies before granting access to Saubio.
adminProviderRequestsPage.empty: No provider requests match these filters.

adminOperationsPage.title: Operations & Monitoring
adminOperationsPage.subtitle: Track the health of Saubio services.

clientMandates.title: Bank mandates & SEPA history
clientMandates.subtitle: Review your SEPA mandates, their status and the PSP events Saubio has received.

list.title: Saved mandates
list.subtitle: Each mandate authorises a SEPA debit. Make sure it stays active before booking new services.
list.empty: No SEPA mandate on your account yet.

events.title: SEPA event log
events.subtitle: Every entry mirrors a webhook received from our PSP. Useful to troubleshoot ongoing or failed payments.

clientMandates.error: We couldn’t load your mandates or SEPA history.

about.heading: Saubio
about.title: About us
about.description: Founded in Berlin, Saubio combines German rigor, premium execution and sustainable cleaning. We bring customers, providers and internal Ops together around transparency, simplicity and positive impact.

pillars.title: Radical sustainability
pillars.body: Certified products, optimised routes and automatic carbon offsetting for every mission.

pillars.title: Verified quality
pillars.body: Audited providers, live indicators and transparent reports for customers and businesses.

pillars.title: Human tech
pillars.body: Simple digital tools to orchestrate teams with a local Saubio support crew available 7/7.

services.heading: Our offer
services.title: Saubio services
services.description: Build a tailored programme mixing residential, business and specialist missions. All assignments are insured and monitored by a dedicated Customer Success Manager.

tariffs.heading: Transparency
tariffs.title: Pricing
tariffs.description: Providers set their hourly rate directly from their profile. Saubio displays the average market range (€28–45/h) so you can benchmark before confirming a mission.
tariffs.disclaimer: Estimates include payroll taxes, insurance, eco products and quality monitoring. A detailed quote is sent prior to confirmation.

guides.heading: Guides & news
guides.title: Saubio insights
guides.description: Practical resources for households, companies and providers: organisation, eco products and ops best practices.

articles.title: Eco-cleaning playbook
articles.excerpt: Combine efficiency, hygiene and a lower carbon footprint.
articles.body: Learn about Saubio-approved eco products, routing best practices and the KPIs we track to reduce energy consumption per mission.

articles.title: Move-in / move-out checklist
articles.excerpt: Key steps to hand back an apartment in perfect shape.
articles.body: Download our end-of-tenancy checklist with dedicated timelines, room-by-room tips and documents to secure the deposit.

articles.title: Handling short-notice missions
articles.excerpt: How the Saubio workflow broadcasts urgent jobs within 48 h.
articles.body: We detail the J+1 process, provider notifications and the way the Mollie deposit is captured then released once a provider accepts.

how.heading: Saubio
how.title: How it works
how.description: Three steps: submit your brief, we match the right provider, you relax.

plan.title: Plan your mission
plan.body: Address, schedule, eco preference – Saubio prepares a transparent estimate.

match.title: Smart matching
match.body: We broadcast the request to vetted profiles and highlight the best option.

relax.title: Relax and track
relax.body: Confirmation, Ops updates and invoices land directly in your dashboard.
